New Records: The Phoenix Suns dropped to a 15-18 record after their loss to the Indiana Pacers
Key Match Events: The Suns lost to the Pacers, extending their losing streak to four games
Pre-Game Insights: The Suns were on a three-game road trip and started with a disappointing performance
Post-Match Reflections: Fans are calling for a rebuild and trades, including for Jimmy Butler
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns have more than a month until the NBA trade deadline
